mapper.insert: insert into board( bno, title, content, writer ) values( seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate from board where bno = #{bno}
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate from board order by bno desc
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
